channel.title: Question about BvS!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Question about BvS!"

item.title: Re: Question about BvS!
item.content:encoded: OK thanks.So 60 days eh?? Well at least I might have a way.My friend over there should have internet.Thanks!

item.title: Re: Question about BvS!
item.content:encoded: The game creator has said you are deleted after 60 days of inactivity. So if you can log in once during your trip you will be fine. If not, then you're cutting it really close.

item.title: Question about BvS! Please answer!
item.content:encoded:
Okay so I like playing BvS regularly.However in about 10 days or so I will be going on holidays for about 2 months.

So my question is If I won't be able to get on BvS at all during that 2 month period will my 2 characters be deleted because of in-activity???and if so how much time before they get deleted???
